basic.description: A study of cultural representations in contemporary film. Special topics may include women in cinema, culture and identity in French and/or Francophone cinema, history through cinema, avant-garde cinema and the 'nouvelle vague'. Travaux pratiques include an oral presentation and an in-depth essay. Given jointly with FREN 327/3.0.
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Le Cinéma aujourd¿hui : Études thématiques

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites    FREN212 and FREN220 and Level 4 and registration in a FREN or FRLG Plan.
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from FREN327; FREN427.
